#Cardano has crossed 100,000 delegators on 18 of December.  A week later, we can see 5000 new people that have delegated $ADA coins to pools. It is approximately 1000 new delegators a day.  It is a very positive trend. 2021 will be a great year for #staking.  https://t.co/oBYathUXW6

#Staking on #Cardano has many positives. $ADA coins are never locked. You can always spend the coins. When you buy new coins, they will be automatically staked. You will receive a reward regularly every 5 days. You need to delegate to a pool that produces blocks. That is all.  https://t.co/WmcHXtawLJ
